hanzi-su-wiki:
狭

Значения

Узкий; сужать, сжимать, сокращать; суживаться, сокращаться

Мнемоника

Тесное 夹 место, где пролезть может только собака 犭.

Варианты

狹

xiá
narrow; narrow-minded
узкий; узкомыслящий
rtega_mnemonic:
狹狹RS
狭狭		narrow, limited, narrow-minded
  • think wedged 夾 thoughts like a dog 犭: be narrow-minded
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 狹)
Pictophonetic: 夹 indicates the sound; 犭 (dog) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
狭窄 [ xiá zhǎi ]: narrow
狭隘 [ xiá ài ]: narrow; tight; narrow minded; lacking in experience
狭小 [ xiá xiǎo ]: narrow
狭义 [ xiá yì ]: narrow sense; restricted sense
狭长 [ xiá cháng ]: long and narrow
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 犭 [ quǎn ] dog
    • 夹 [ jiā ] to support; to be wedged between
heisig_chinese_memo: In a narrow space, a brave man holds off PACK OF WILD DOGS with only a pair of SCISSORS.
heisig_constituent: cramped, pack of wild dogs, scissors, husband, horns
koohiiStory1: A pack of wild dogs, waiting in a very cramped waiting room, to get their hair cut by Edward Scissors Hands, who is very popular.
koohiiStory2: In a CRAMPED space, a brave man holds off PACK OF WILD DOGS with only a pair of SCISSORS.
kunYomi: せま.い、せば.める、せば.まる、さ
jp_example_words: 狭い(せまい): narrow, confined, small
jp_readingExamples: 狭まる (せば.まる), 狭める (せば.める), 狭い (せま.い)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have an animal for a husband with horns that are narrow. This animal husband of yours is a goat. A goat with narrow horns. Why is this animal your husband? You’re weird, that’s why.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself married to this animal husband with horns that are narrow. It’s a strange marriage. Listen to the goat making its goat noises as it clomps around your home. Now hug your goat husband and feel its soft fluffy coat against your skin.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: I’m not even going to get into the semantics (せま) of how this weird relationship of yours works. Nope, this reading explanation is on the straight and narrow. Need to know basis. Classified. All that junk. There will be no discussion of the semantics between you and your goat lover.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: But that doesn’t mean you can’t imagine the semantics. The finer points of the relationship. Go ahead, imagine all the weird stuff that comes with the territory for having a goat as a husband. Use all that weird stuff to remember this kanji and its reading. Want an example? Just imagine the goat doing dishes! Goats don’t have hands! Hahahahaha!!
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 二 (два), 亠 (крышка), 人 (человек), 并, 大 (большой), 犯 (преступник)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: between (夹) the dogs (犭) it's narrow
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When I call out, my narrow formation of sled dogs press from  both sides and run faster.

狭字的基本解释

狭
（狹）
xiá
窄，不宽阔，与“广”相对：狭窄。狭长。狭隘。偏狭。狭邪（指小街曲巷娼妓居住的地方。亦作“狭斜”）。
窄广

狭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》侯夾切，入洽，匣。］
“夾4”的被通假字。“狭1”的繁体字。
(1)窄。横的距离小。与“宽”、“广”相对。
(2)小；少。
(3)小看；轻视。
(4)指见识或心胸狭隘。
(5)急促；急迫。
(6)迫近；靠近。参见“狹坐”。
(7)不丰裕。
(8)通“俠”。

狭字的英文翻译

◎ 狭
narrow

狭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狹； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页711第10
【玉篇】下甲切【正韻】胡夾切，?音匣。【玉篇】同狎。今爲闊狹。【書·咸有一德】無自廣以狹人。【釋文】狹，戸夾反。　又【廣韻】侯夾切【集韻】轄夾切，?音洽。【廣韻】隘狹。【禮·禮器】禮之大倫，以地廣狹。【釋文】狹，音洽，又戸夾反。【史記·滑稽傳】臣見其所持者狹，而所欲者奢。

狭字的源字形

狭字的起名意思

暂无。

narrow
Basic explanation of words
narrow
(narrow)
xiá
Narrow, not wide, as opposed to "wide": narrow. Long and narrow. narrow. Intolerance. Xia Xie (refers to the place where the prostitutes live in the small streets and alleys. Also called "Xiaxie").
Narrow and wide
narrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guang Yun" Hou clip cut, enter into contact, box. ]
"Clip 4" was passed falsely. Traditional Chinese characters for "篠1".
(1) Narrow. The horizontal distance is small. Contrast with "wide" and "wide".
(2) Small; less.
(3) Underestimate; underestimate.
(4) Refers to insight or narrow-mindedness.
(5) Urgent; urgent.
(6) Approaching; approaching. See "Narrow Sitting".
(7) Not rich.
(8) Through "Xia".
narrow
English translation of words
◎ narrow
narrow
narrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Section 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 narrow; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 711 10
[Jade articles] Lower nail cut [Zheng Yun] Hu clip cut, sound box. 【Jade articles】Tongxuan. Today is wide and narrow. 【Book·Xianyueyi】There is no self-confidence to narrow people. 【Explanation】Narrow, reversed.　[Guangyun] Hou Jiaqie [Jiyun] Administer Jiaqie,? Yin Qia. [Guangyun] Narrow-minded. 【Rite·Ritual Vessel】The great virtue of ritual is wide and narrow. [Explanation] Narrow, sound, and reverse. [Historical Records·Comical Biography] The ministers saw that they were narrow, but those who wanted to be extravagant.
narrow

narrow
Name meaning
Nothing.
狭
形声字。犬(犭)表意,犬性狭隘,常为争食而斗;夾(夹jid)表声,夹有两边用力挤住义,相挤必狭窄。声旁简化。本义
是狭隘。
窄,宽度小,跟“广”相对:~窄|~隘」~义。
~长 ~陋 ~小 ~路相逢 補~ 促~ 宽~
xiá
機。
陳。
狭
,狹|狭
隶
简
узкий
Пиктофонетические символы.
Собака (犭) выражает смысл, собака ограничена и часто борется за еду; зажим (джид) выражает звук, а зажим имеет две стороны, чтобы с силой сжимать праведность, и сжатие должно быть узким.
Голосовое упрощение.
Первоначальное значение узкое.
Узкий, малая ширина, в отличие от «широкого»: ~ узкий | ~ узкий ~ ~ значение.
~ ~ Длинные ~ скромные ~ маленькие ~ встретить дорогу, чтобы составить ~ ~ продвигать ~ широкую ~ машину.
Чен.
узкий
, Узкий | узкий
писец
просто
xiá
I прил.
1) узкий, тесный, сжатый
这一段的路面太狭 здесь дорога очень узкая
地狭人稠 земли мало, а население её плотное
狭薄 недостаточный и тощий (о земле)
2) узкий, ограниченный; незначительный (напр. о способностях)
他的心眼儿很狭 он — человек с недалёким (узким) кругозором
其所持者狭, 而所欲者奢 он опирается в делах на слишком малое, а хочет слишком многого
3) дробный, частый (о звуках)
狭则思欲 когда они (звуки музыки) дробны — возбуждают мысли о страстях
II гл.
* считать мелким (незначительным); унижать, презирать
无自广以狭人 не старайся казаться значительным за счёт унижения других
III словообр.
в составе биологических терминов соответствует префиксу: стено-
狭温性 стенотермный
狭盐性 стеногалинный
狭生境 стенотопный
狭食性 стенофагия
Radicals: 犭, 夫  (animal, husband, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have an animal for a husband with horns that are narrow. This animal husband of yours is a goat. A goat with narrow horns. Why is this animal your husband? You’re weird, that’s why.
Imagine yourself married to this animal husband with horns that are narrow. It’s a strange marriage. Listen to the goat making its goat noises as it clomps around your home. Now hug your goat husband and feel its soft fluffy coat against your skin.
Reading Mnemonic
I’m not even going to get into the semantics (せま) of how this weird relationship of yours works. Nope, this reading explanation is on the straight and narrow. Need to know basis. Classified. All that junk. There will be no discussion of the semantics between you and your goat lover.
But that doesn’t mean you can’t imagine the semantics. The finer points of the relationship. Go ahead, imagine all the weird stuff that comes with the territory for having a goat as a husband. Use all that weird stuff to remember this kanji and its reading. Want an example? Just imagine the goat doing dishes! Goats don’t have hands! Hahahahaha!!
